eu.moeebius.usermodelling.interfaces

Interface UserModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HaldiRobinson2008IndoorOutdoorTemp, HaldiRobinson2008IndoorTemp, HaldiRobinson2008OutdoorTemp, HaldiRobinson2009Params, RijalEtAl2007GlobeOutdoorTemp, RijalEtAl2007GlobeTemp, RijalEtAl2007OutdoorTemp, RijalEtAl2008GlobeOutdoorTemp, YunSteemers2008IndoorTempNightVentilation, YunSteemers2008IndoorTempNoNightVentilation, YunSteemers2008OutdoorTempNoNightVentilation, YunTuohySteemers2009IndoorTemp

    public interface UserModel
    Defines an interface for User Models

    • Method Detail

      • setName

        void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of the User Model
        Parameters:
        name - The User Model name

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the User Model
        Returns:
        The User Model name

      • setParameters

        void setParameters(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix parameters)
        Sets the parameters of the User Model. These are e.g. the regression coefficients in logistic regression.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The parameters of the User Model

      • getParameters

        org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix getParameters()
        Returns the parameters of the User Model. These are configuration parameters, tailored to the specific User Model (e.g. the regression coefficients in logistic regression).
        Returns:
        The parameters of the User Model

      • calculateActionProbability

        double calculateActionProbability(UserType.USER_TYPES userType,
                                  TransitionOccupantState.TRANSITION_STATES transitionState,
                                  TransitionSystemState.TRANSITION_STATES transitionSystemState,
                                  org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix actionDrives)
        Calculates the probability of action (e.g. opening the window) for a giver User Model and specific inputs (e.g. indoor temperature)
        Parameters:
        actionDrives - A set of inputs (e.g. indoor temperature) that drives user behavior
        transitionState - Markov transitions for occupancy status
        transitionSystemState - Markov transitions for controllable system status
        Returns:
        The probability the user will perform an action (e.g. lower the blinds or open the window), based on the user model and the specific action drives

      • predictAction

        double predictAction(UserType.USER_TYPES userType,
                     TransitionOccupantState.TRANSITION_STATES transitionState,
                     TransitionSystemState.TRANSITION_STATES transitionSystemState,
                     org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix actionDrives)
        Predicts if the user will perform an action (e.g. lower the blinds or open the window) in the next time-step, based on a set of inputs that drive user behavior (e.g. indoor temperature)
        Parameters:
        actionDrives - A set of inputs (e.g. indoor temperature) that drives user behavior
        transitionState - Markov transitions for occupancy status
        transitionSystemState - Markov transitions for controllable system status
        Returns:
        1 - if the user is predicted to perform an action; 0 - if the user is more likely not to interact with the system
